query:
SELECT 
            COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN direction = 'Incoming' THEN amount::bigint ELSE 0 END), 0) as total_incoming,
            COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN direction = 'Outgoing' THEN amount::bigint ELSE 0 END), 0) as total_outgoing
        FROM transactions 
        WHERE api_key_id = $1 
        AND created_at >= $2 
        AND created_at <= $3
